titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to change the deadline for income tax returns for calendar year taxpayers from the 15th of April to the first Monday in November.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/5/2011--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to change the income tax filing deadline for calendar year taxpayers from April 15 to the first Monday in November.
